General.Name: Hanma Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hanma Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of heavy trucks, special vehicles, and auto parts in the People's Republic of China. It offers tractors, dump trucks, mixer trucks, and bulk powder material and truck-mounted lifting transport vehicles, as well as heavy-duty truck chassis, heavy-duty trucks, concrete mixer trucks, bulk cement trucks, semi-trailer tractors, concrete pump trucks, engineering dump trucks, engines, gearboxes, axles, etc. The company also engages in the production of road motor vehicles; sale of new cars and energy vehicles; car rental and second-hand car distribution businesses; wholesale and retail of auto parts; import and export of goods; and manufacturing and sale of construction machinery. In addition, it provides motor vehicle refitting, repair, and maintenance services; and technical, technology development, technical consultation, technical exchange, and technology transfer and promotion services. The company was formerly known as Hualing Xingma Automobile (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hanma Technology Group Co.,Ltd. in December 2020. Hanma Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Maanshan, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Eco & Tech Dev Zone, Maanshan, China, 243061
